select * from review where mEmail = #{mEmail} and rDrop = 'N'
select sum(A) from (select count(*) A from qnaboard where memail=#{memail} union select count(*) A from qnareply where memail=#{memail})

select * from (select rownum rnum, A.* from (select * from (select qnaboard.*,0 as qrid, null as qrreg, null as qrdrop from qnaboard union select qid, memail, null as qnatitle, null as qnacontent, null as qnaorifile,null as qnareg,null as qnadrop, 'Y' as qnayn,qrid,qrreg,qrdrop from qnareply) where memail=#{memail} order by qid DESC, qrid asc) A) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select rownum rnum,qnaboard.* from qnaboard where qid=#{qid}
mapper.update: update review set rdrop = 'Y' where rid = #{rid}
